title: Ticket #6316: Add -annex-name_s_ <list> and/or -annex-regex <regex> to tools
description:
See #6313 for a list of places where the -annex flag already shows up.

This ticket is the idea that you might want to get information about more than one annex but not about all of them; we don't know if anyone does or if they'd be unhappy using -const, instead.
creator: tlmiller
